statements: SELECT * FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT genre_name, associated_artists FROM music_genres WHERE genre_name LIKE 'R%';
SELECT * FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT genre_description, associated_artists FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name ASC, genre_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT genre_name, genre_description, associated_artists FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY genre_id ASC
SELECT MAX(genre_id) AS max_id, MIN(genre_id) AS min_id FROM music_genres
SELECT genre_name, SUBSTRING(genre_description, 1, 50) AS short_description, LENGTH(genre_description) AS desc_length FROM music_genres WHERE LENGTH(genre_description) > 50
SELECT * FROM music_genres WHERE genre_name LIKE 'R%' OR genre_name LIKE 'H%'
SELECT * FROM music_genres;
SELECT genre_name, description FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN music_genres ON artists.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN music_genres ON artists.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id WHERE artist_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN music_genres ON artists.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name, description FROM artists JOIN music_genres ON artists.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY artist_name;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS num_songs FROM artists JOIN songs ON artists.artist_id = songs.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN music_genres ON artists.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id WHERE genre_name LIKE '%rock%';
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN genres ON artists.artist_genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT album_name, artist_name FROM albums JOIN artists ON albums.album_artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artists FROM genres JOIN artists ON genres.genre_id = artists.artist_genre_id GROUP BY genre_name;
SELECT * FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name, genre_description FROM artists JOIN genres ON artists.artist_genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT album_name, artist_name FROM albums JOIN artists ON albums.album_artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists JOIN genres ON artists.artist_genre_id = genres.genre_id ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM genres WHERE genre_name LIKE '%Rock%';
SELECT * FROM music_genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, artist_description FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 2;
SELECT album_title, album_artist_id, album_genre_id FROM albums ORDER BY album_title DESC;
SELECT song_title, song_artist_id, song_album_id, song_genre_id FROM songs WHERE song_genre_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, artist_description, genre_name FROM artists JOIN music_genres ON artists.artist_genre_id = music_genres.genre_id;
SELECT album_title, artist_name FROM albums JOIN artists ON albums.album_artist_id = artists.artist_id;

SELECT song_title, album_title, artist_name, genre_name FROM songs JOIN albums ON songs.song_album_id = albums.album_id JOIN artists ON songs.song_artist_id = artists.artist_id JOIN music_genres ON songs.song_genre_id = music_genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre_id FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE album_release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT song_name, song_duration FROM songs WHERE song_album_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT artist_name, album_name, album_release_date FROM artists INNER JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.album_artist_id;
SELECT song_name, song_duration FROM songs WHERE song_album_id = 3 ORDER BY song_duration DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
